abstract: Tennessee Gov Bill Haslam signs controversial measure that prohibits local municipalities from barring people with handgun carry permits from bringing firearms to public parks, playgrounds and sports fields.
lead_paragraph: Local governments in Tennessee can no longer bar people with handgun carry permits from bringing firearms to parks, playgrounds and sports fields under legislation signed by Gov. Bill Haslam.

headline.main: Tennessee: Cities Are Prohibited From Keeping Parks Gun-Free
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Cities Are Prohibited From Keeping Parks Gun-Free

snippet: Local governments in Tennessee can no longer bar people with handgun carry permits from bringing firearms to parks, playgrounds and sports fields under legislation signed by Gov. Bill Haslam.
